stimulusHtml: Which of the following best describes the value of  total  as a result of executing the code segment?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

 

int[][] board = new int[5][4]; 

/* code to initialize board */

int total = 0; 
for (int r = 1; r < board.length; r += 2) 
{ 
   for (int c = 0; c < board[0].length; c++) 
   { 
      total += board[r][c]; 
   } 
}

choicesHtml: It contains the sum of elements in even-numbered rows.
It contains the sum of elements in odd-numbered rows.
It contains the sum of elements in even-numbered columns.
It contains the sum of elements in odd-numbered columns.
